Dm_RT_0033_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>What are we going to do with that boy?<sp:0:4:0>It's just like him to fly off on his own and
leave all the food we collected behind.
Dm_RT_0033_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>You're here to talk to Tulin, eh? <sp:5:0:0>You just
missed him, unfortunately.
Dm_RT_0033_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Our task was to scavenge food in this
area, but we just saw a flock of monsters
fly past outside the cave.<sp:0:4:0>The same ones that have been sighted
around the village lately, in fact.
Dm_RT_0033_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>I told the others we should return right
away to report them, but Tulin clearly
wasn't listening at all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>He said, "I'm gonna follow them back to
their nest," and flew off alone before I
could protest.
Dm_RT_0033_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If you leave the cave and head north, you
can spot a <clr:0000>lone cedar tree<clr:ffff> on Talonto
Peak. That's where we saw the monsters.<sp:0:4:0>No doubt Tulin followed them there.
Dm_RT_0033_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>I know he thinks he's unbeatable, but he
really shouldn't be taking these chances.
Dm_RT_0033_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I'll be! What is a Hylian doing all the
way up here in such a fierce blizzard?
